SEARCH
Package com.example.haboob

Class EventsList

java.lang.Object
com.example.haboob.EventsList
public class EventsList extends Object
EventsList manages all Event objects in the Firestore "events" collection.

It provides methods to:

  • Load events from Firestore into memory
  • Add and delete events from Firestore
  • Filter or query locally loaded events by various attributes

This class can be instantiated in two ways:

  • Connected to Firestore (default constructor)
  • In-memory only (for unit tests)
It also supports optional callbacks via EventsList.OnEventsLoadedListener for asynchronous operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • EventsList

      public EventsList()
      Default constructor.

      Initializes Firestore and automatically loads all events from the "events" collection into eventsList.

    • EventsList

      public EventsList(EventsList.OnEventsLoadedListener listener)
      Constructor that also accepts a listener for completion notifications.
      Parameters:
      listener - Listener called after Firestore load completes or fails

    • EventsList

      public EventsList(boolean inMemoryOnly)
      Constructor used for unit testing.

      When inMemoryOnly is true, this instance operates without touching Firestore.

      Parameters:
      inMemoryOnly - true for local-only mode, false for Firestore-connected mode

  • Method Details

    • getEventsList

      public ArrayList<Event> getEventsList()
      Returns the current in-memory list of all events.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Event objects

    • isLoaded

      public boolean isLoaded()
      Indicates whether the list of events has finished loading from Firestore.
      Returns:
      true if loaded, false otherwise

    • loadEventsList

      public void loadEventsList(EventsList.OnEventsLoadedListener listener)
      Loads all events from the Firestore "events" collection into memory.

      This operation is asynchronous; use EventsList.OnEventsLoadedListener to be notified when complete.

      Parameters:
      listener - Optional callback to handle success or failure

    • loadEventsList

      public void loadEventsList()
      Loads all events from Firestore without using a callback listener.

    • addEvent

      public String addEvent(Event e, EventsList.OnEventsLoadedListener listener)
      Adds a new Event to Firestore and appends it to the local list upon success.

      Firestore automatically generates a unique document ID, while the eventID is managed internally by the Event class.

      Parameters:
      e - The Event to add
      listener - Optional listener for asynchronous completion
      Returns:
      The event's internal eventID

    • addEvent

      public String addEvent(Event e)
      Adds a new event without specifying a listener.
      Parameters:
      e - The event to add
      Returns:
      The event's internal eventID

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(Event e, EventsList.OnEventsLoadedListener listener)
      Deletes the specified event from Firestore and removes it from the local list.

      The event is matched in Firestore by its eventID field.

      Parameters:
      e - The Event to delete
      listener - Optional callback for completion
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if eventsList is empty

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(Event e)
      Deletes an event from Firestore without specifying a listener.
      Parameters:
      e - The event to delete

    • getEventByID

      public Event getEventByID(String eventID)
      Retrieves an Event from the in-memory list by its eventID.
      Parameters:
      eventID - Unique event identifier
      Returns:
      Matching Event, or null if not found

    • filterEvents

      public ArrayList<Event> filterEvents(List<String> tags)
      Filters events by a list of tag strings.

      Matching is case-insensitive, and all provided tags must be present in the event’s tag list.

      Parameters:
      tags - List of tags to match; if null or empty, returns all events
      Returns:
      Filtered list of Event objects

    • getOrganizerEvents

      public ArrayList<Event> getOrganizerEvents(String organizerID)
      Returns all events created by a specific organizer.
      Parameters:
      organizerID - The organizer’s unique ID
      Returns:
      List of events associated with that organizer

    • getEntrantWaitlistEvents

      public ArrayList<Event> getEntrantWaitlistEvents(String entrantID)
      Returns all events where a given entrant is currently on the waiting list.
      Parameters:
      entrantID - The entrant’s unique user ID
      Returns:
      List of events for which this entrant is waitlisted

    • getEntrantEnrolledEvents

      public ArrayList<Event> getEntrantEnrolledEvents(String entrantID)
      Returns a list of events that the given entrant is currently enrolled in.
      Parameters:
      entrantID - the entrant’s unique user ID
      Returns:
      list of events in which this entrant is enrolled

    • getLiveEvents

      public ArrayList<Event> getLiveEvents()
      Returns all “live” events — events that either have no registration end date or whose registration end date is after the current date.
      Returns:
      List of currently active events

    • getOrganizerCurrentEvents

      public ArrayList<Event> getOrganizerCurrentEvents(ArrayList<Event> orgEventsList)
      Returns the organizer’s “current” events based on registration end date.

      An event is considered current if its registration end date is either null or before the current time.

      Parameters:
      orgEventsList - list of events associated with the organizer
      Returns:
      list of events whose registration has already closed (or has no end date)

    • getOrganizerUpcomingEvents

      public ArrayList<Event> getOrganizerUpcomingEvents(ArrayList<Event> orgEventsList)
      Returns the organizer’s upcoming events based on registration end date.

      An event is considered upcoming if its registration end date is either null or after the current time.

      Parameters:
      orgEventsList - list of events associated with the organizer
      Returns:
      list of events whose registration is still open (or has no end date)
